snippet: Citing pressure from the Pakistani government, Facebook said it blocked left-wing political pages and a popular rock band, Laal, whose members spoke out against Taliban.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and SALMAN MASOOD

lead_paragraph: Citing pressure from the Pakistani government, Facebook said it blocked left-wing political pages and a popular rock band, Laal, whose members spoke out against Taliban.

headline.main: Facebook Under Fire for Temporarily Blocking Pages in Pakistan
